verses.name: Ezekiel 24:17
verses.text: Forbear to cry, make no mourning for the dead, bind the tire of thine head upon thee, and put on thy shoes upon thy feet, and cover not thy lips, and eat not the bread of men.

verses.name: Ezekiel 24:18
verses.text: So I spake unto the people in the morning: and at even my wife died; and I did in the morning as I was commanded.

verses.name: Ezekiel 24:19
verses.text: And the people said unto me, Wilt thou not tell us what these things are to us, that thou doest so?

verses.name: Ezekiel 24:20
verses.text: Then I answered them, The word of the Lord came unto me, saying,
